Title: Alice in Cyberland
Description: ['When criminal Cybernackists appear in the Cyberland, the vast 21st century computer networks, Alice, Miss Catnick, Leina, and Julie are drawn in by the mysterious Lucia to become a fighting force of young girl soldiers in the Cyberland to combat the criminal element. ']
Staff: [['Ishidou, Hiroyuki', 'Episode Director'], ['Konaka, Chiaki', 'Script'], ['Moriyama, Daisuke', 'Original Character Design'], ['Shimazu, Ikuo', 'Animation Director']]
